title: Pixel 4 XL WiFi Disconnects after Android 11 Upgrade
content:
After upgrading my P4 XL to Android 11, I've started noticing WiFi disconnects on the regular. So, I did a factory reset - usually do this after a major upgrade of Android - and, it's still happening. None of my other devices disconnect as frequently as my P4 XL, so it's not the router.

This did not happen on Android 10 at all, so, it's definitely a bug in Android 11 and possibly the new P4 XL firmware. Anyone else experiencing a similar issue?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
